titleStmt.title: A proclamation to restrain the excessive carriages in wagons and four-wheeled carts to the destruction of high-ways
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Bill and Christopher Barker ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
At head of title: By the King.
At end of text: Given at our court at Whitehall, the sixteenth day of August, 1661. in the thirteenth year of our raign.
